thread.title: A new life for plastic bags

author: HANNAH KINSON, TIMES-NEWS
title: A new life for plastic bags
text: A new life for plastic bags HANNAH KINSON, TIMES-NEWS Feb 15, 2024 Feb 15, 2024 Updated 35 mins ago 0 Facebook WhatsApp SMS Print Copy article link Save KD McCombs helps a student sew a quilt Thursday, Feb. 15, 2024, during a project for Random Acts of Kindness Week at White Pine Elementary School in Burley. Students made sleeping mats and pillows out of donated plastic bags to give to the Magic Valley Humanitarian Center for the homeless.
